      • resetMessageMargins

        public void resetMessageMargins(boolean imageRetrievalSuccessful)
        Since SimpleDraweeViews use placeholders, we cannot directly check the nullity of its View Drawable to check if the view should be removed.

      • getMessageClickableView

        public android.view.View getMessageClickableView()
        Description copied from interface: IInAppMessageView
        Gets the clickable portion of the in-app message so that Appboy can add click listeners to it.
        Specified by:
        getMessageClickableView in interface IInAppMessageView
        Returns:
        the View that displays the clickable portion of the in-app message. If the entire message is clickable, return this.

      • getMessageSimpleDraweeView

        public abstract android.view.View getMessageSimpleDraweeView()
        In cases where the Fresco library isn't provided, we can't have the SimpleDraweeView class as actual signature of this method. Thus, we return View for this method and cast it when needed.
